projects.title: Campaign Craze
projects.description: Campaign Craze provides a comprehensive view of influencer content within campaigns, offering a visually engaging and data-rich experience showcasing an image carousel with influencer info and campaign performance with insightful metrics.
projects.details: Campaign Craze is built with react and utilizes dynamic lazy loading for infinite scrolling, ensuring images load seamlessly as the user scrolls. This design guarantees a smooth and efficient experience across various screen sizes, providing a clear and insightful view of influencer campaign performance.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: My portfolio website is more than just a collection of projects; it's a digital narrative of my journey as a Frontend Developer, a story told in code and design.
projects.details: Designed with a sleek, contemporary aesthetic, it invites you to explore my skills, experience, and the passion that fuels my work. Experience the flexibility of switching between light and dark themes. This website is a reflection of my dedication to crafting impactful and user-centric digital experiences highlighting my technical capabilities and creative vision.
